title: Unnamed variables with _
summary: Use _ to signal intent when a variable is intentionally unused.
explanation: Unnamed variables communicate to readers and tools that a value is deliberately ignored. No more 'ignored' or 'unused' naming conventions, no more IDE warnings.

whyModernWins.title: Clear intent
whyModernWins.desc: _ explicitly says 'this value is not needed here'.

whyModernWins.title: No warnings
whyModernWins.desc: IDEs and linters won't flag intentionally unused variables.

whyModernWins.title: Cleaner lambdas
whyModernWins.desc: Multi-param lambdas are cleaner when you only need some params.
